name: conclusion
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: conclusion
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: Be careful not to introduce new ideas in the conclusion of your essay.
example.egtrans: 注意不要在你的论文结论部分引入新的想法。

example.eg: In conclusion, I would like to thank our guest speaker.
example.egtrans: 最后，我要感谢我们的演讲嘉宾。

dsense.name: conclusion
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the act of arranging or agreeing something formally

example.egtrans: 协议的达成／条约的缔结

dsense.name: conclusion
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the opinion you have after considering all the information about something

example.eg: Did you come to/reach/draw any conclusions at the meeting this morning?
example.egtrans: 今天上午的会议上你们有没有作出什么决定？

example.eg: At first I thought he was a bit shy, but I've come to the conclusion that he's simply unfriendly!
example.egtrans: 起初我以为他有点害羞，可是后来我断定他就是不友好！
